pr_title: HDDS-3071. Datanodes unable to connect to recon in Secure Environment

timeline.message: HDDS-3071. Datanodes unable to connect to recon in Secure Environment

timeline.author: vivekratnavel

replies.bodyText: Yes, I can use it. I could not get a general idea of when to use "RECON" config tag. Why do we have an "OZONE" config tag? :)
replies.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: The default value here should be * instead of empty.
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

timeline.bodyText: Given the reuse part is limited, it is better to move the new logic directly into addReconServer without introducing passiveSCM?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: Yes, I agree. Will refactor this part.
replies.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: NIT: can you highlight the changes relate to the issue? Or the change in this file is a refactor?

timeline.bodyText: datanodeDetails toString is very verbose. You may choose to just log the hostname/ip here.

timeline.bodyText: NIT: If we add a parameter Class<?> protocol for protocol? we don't need to overwrite getRpcServer in ReconDatanodeProtocolServer class.
